items.title: Lawsuit Accuses Trump Officials of More Wrongful Deportations
items.summary: Plaintiffs accused the Trump administration of using so-called third-country deportations to violate court-ordered protections for migrants, echoing the case of Kilmar Armando Abrego Garcia.

items.title: California’s $23 Billion Plan to Restore Federal Cuts to Scientific Research
items.summary: Democrats are calling for the creation of a state equivalent of the National Institutes of Health, but first state lawmakers and then voters would need to approve it.

items.title: Vance Invokes Charlie Kirk in Midterms Push to G.O.P. Donors
items.summary: Vice President JD Vance urged major contributors to win the 2026 midterms to honor Charlie Kirk, who was Mr. Vance’s close friend.

items.title: How Law Enforcement Got the Man Suspected of Killing Charlie Kirk
items.summary: F.B.I. leaders touted the immense federal deployment assigned to find the assassin. But their big break came with a single tip — from the suspect’s own family.

items.title: The suspect was a member of the Mormon church at a young age.

items.summary: The New York Times examined video footage to better understand what was said during Mr. Kirk’s event at Utah Valley University.

items.title: Widow of Charlie Kirk says her ‘cries will echo around the world like a battle cry’
items.summary: <p>In statement Friday, Erika Kirk says ‘evildoers responsible for my husband’s assassination have no idea what they have done’</p><ul><li><p><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/sep/12/trump-fox-friends-charlie-kirk-shooting">Trump declines to call for unity after Charlie Kirk killing in stunning move</a></p></li></ul><p>Erika Kirk, the widow of rightwing activist and provocateur <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/charlie-kirk-shooting">Charlie Kirk</a>, said in a statement Friday evening that her late husband’s message and mission will be “stronger, bolder, louder and greater than ever” and that her “cries will echo around the world like a battle cry”.</p><p>“I loved knowing one of his mottos was ‘never surrender’,” she said of her late husband. “We’ll never surrender.”</p> <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/sep/12/erika-kirk-charlie-kirk">Continue reading...</a>
